oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reach Optimized Architecture for Multi-rate Transport System (ROAMTS) : one size does not fit all
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GUMASTE, A
GHANI, N
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose a new system for high-speed optical communication in the metro area. The system is based on the concept one-size does not fit all philosophy for optical networks. Architecture and performance issues are discussed. (C) 2009 Optical Society of America
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: OFC: 2009 CONFERENCE ON OPTICAL FIBER COMMUNICATION, VOLS 1-5,1143-1145
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Conference on Optical Fiber Communication (OFC 2009),San Diego, CA,MAR 22-26, 2009
